txt.en: 'Bah, let them rot! Men's lives come first, I say.'
'We have no orders, no captain, not half our force. And you would have us do what?'
'And I say we have no such authority to act.'
'Wait for Captain Lachír or go after him. Nothing else.'
'Captain Lachír... gone. I cannot fathom it!'
'I've had my way then, lot of good it did me. You might as well have yours.'
'Go on, chase these cursed flags then. I'll not stand against it.'
'Sorrow and madness, that is what this place holds for us.'
